channel.title: Adding a specific item from inventory to bank
channel.description:
EDIT: nvm i found fix lol... in itemassistant command in there called "additemtobank" i wonder if theres a way to make it take an item out of bank like the opposite of this? if anyone could figure this out it would help me a lot kinda like ::bankall but instead i want it just to bank a certain item in the inventory i tried changing this
for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]);
but i just could not find out how it works it just wouldnt work with anything i tried to do.

item.title: Adding a specific item from inventory to bank
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

EDIT:
nvm i found fix lol… in itemassistant command in there called “additemtobank”
i wonder if theres a way to make it take an item out of bank like the opposite of this?
if anyone could figure this out it would help me a lot

kinda like ::bankall but instead i want it just to bank a certain item in the inventory
i tried changing this

for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]);
but i just could not find out how it works it just wouldnt work with anything i tried to do.
